description: Trystan Bull is feeling like one lucky man right now. We made him a site dedicated to the Bull himself and he is loving every minute of it that he wanted Rod Daily to come over so he could share some thoughts on it.Surprisingly Rod brought with him the cute friendly Jesse Cox. Rod is a good friend and loves to share. Once Jesse knew what the plans were for the day she couldn't keep her hands of Trystan. The trio kick back for a quick minute and then Rod and Jesse give Trystan the break he needs. This friendly scene gets messy at the end with loads of cum and sweat dripping off these hot bodies.Enjoy!
title: Friendly Sharing
